result.eng: I fell asleep even though the film was very interesting.

result.orig: thit mé i mo chodladh cé go raibh an scannán an-suimiúil

result.eng: She fell in love with a married man.
result.ga: thit sí i ngrá le fear pósta

result.eng: Some airplane just fell from the sky.

result.eng: Heavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.
result.ga: thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áit
result.orig: thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áit

result.eng: One night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.
result.ga: oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlár
result.orig: oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlár
result.html: oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlárOne night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.

result.eng: The envelope fell out of his pocket.
